text: María Clemencia "Tutina" Rodríguez de Santos (née Rodríguez Múnera, born 13 November 1955) is the wife of the 32nd President of Colombia, Juan Manuel Santos. She was the First Lady of Colombia from August 2010 until August 2018. She was seen as a fashion icons in Colombia when she was first lady. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:First Ladies of Colombia Category:Designers Category:People from Bogotá
title: María Clemencia de Santos
